titleStmt.title: Sermons of Barnardine Ochine of Sena godlie, frutefull, and uery necessarye for all true Christians translated out of Italien into Englishe
titleStmt.author: Ochino, Bernardino, 1487-1564.
Bacon, Anne Cooke, Lady, 1528?-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Carr for W. Redell],

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Lady Anne Bacon, of the Italian original.

"STC lists this as another edition of the 1548 Ipswich collection of sermons translated by Richard Argentine. it is, however, an entirely different work, the translator of which is unidentified."--NUC Pre-1956.
Title page marked, torn and stained.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
